name: Order is half the Battle
description:
Vibrant Technology hired you to help them do an exemplary job. 
True to their motto: ‚Order is half of the battle‘, you are doing important work for mankind. That is, sorting items from an assembly line onto a carpet.

Keep in mind following standards of Vibrant Technologies:

Avoid kicking out items off the screen!
Do not place the objects on top of each other!
Order ist half the battle!
